https://tmrev.io/movie/107944-A Letter to Dad 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1OLiARBpeNuG9SD1Zrb1OPLzpoz.jpg Dan Donahue has finally met the woman of his dreams. But on the night he is going to propose, he is overcome by deep-rooted anger caused by the father who abandoned him as a boy. Dan confronts his feelings of bitterness head on as he pours his heart out in a letter to his father. A Letter to Dad
